content:
ServicePlacementNonPartiallyPlaceServicePolicyDescription Class

Definition

Placement policy description that describes a service placement where all replicas must be able to be placed in order for any replicas to be created.

In this Article

public sealed class ServicePlacementNonPartiallyPlaceServicePolicyDescription : System.Fabric.Description.ServicePlacementPolicyDescription
Inheritance
Object
ServicePlacementPolicyDescription
ServicePlacementNonPartiallyPlaceServicePolicyDescription

Inherited Members

Methods
